content: **knitted jacket in drops baby alpaca silk and drops kid-silk the piece is worked with textured pattern and v-neck sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no bs-168 yarn group a + a or c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops baby alpaca silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 250-250-300-300-350-350 g colour 7219 pistachio and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 100-100-125-125-125-150 g colour 34 sage green drops buttons marble no 630 3 items in all sizes needles drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
